asset.value: Scope options for Find/Replace actions on the current document.
Scope options for Find/Replace actions on all open documents.
Scope options for Find/Replace actions on the file system.
File or Directory does not exist: {$value_1}
Add the word "{$value_1}" to the word dictionary?
The text that will replace the misspelled word.
A list of suggested spellings for the misspelled word.
The text from the outline node where the misspelling occurs. The misspelled word is highlighted in bold red.
Skips this occurrence of the misspelled word.
Skips all occurrences of the misspelled word.
Replaces this occurrence of the misspelled word with the replacement text.
Replaces all occurrences of the misspelled word with the replacement text.
Adds a new word to the dictionary.
Finishes spell checking and applys all replacements to the document.
Cancels spell checking and does not apply any changes to the document.
